record.title: PERMISSION FOR COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND COMMERCE TO FILE SUPPLEMENTAL REPORT ON H.R. 493, GENETIC INFORMATION NONDISCRIMINATION ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Energy and Commerce be permitted to file a supplemental report on H.R. 493.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Jersey?
